meanings.definition: Consisting of eight things or parts.
meanings.sent1: The octonary puzzle had eight pieces to put together.
meanings.sent2: The octonary team consisted of eight players on the field.
meanings.sent3: The octonary cake had eight layers, making it a delicious treat for the party.
meanings.sent4: The octonary rainbow displayed eight vibrant colors in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The octonary flag fluttered proudly with its eight stripes.

meanings.definition: A group or set of eight.
meanings.sent1: The octonary of ducks waddled by the pond.
meanings.sent2: The octonary gathered for a meeting to discuss their plans.
meanings.sent3: The octonary of kittens played together in the yard, causing mischief.
meanings.sent4: The octonary of stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The octonary of books on the shelf caught the librarian's eye.

meanings.definition: A book or manuscript made up of eight leaves.
meanings.sent1: The ancient library displayed an octonary from the medieval era.
meanings.sent2: The scholar studied the octonary carefully, examining each leaf.
meanings.sent3: The octonary was so old that it crumbled to dust when touched.
meanings.sent4: The octonary contained valuable information about the history of the region.
meanings.sent5: The octonary was beautifully illustrated with intricate designs on each leaf.
